account.updateDataError: there was an error updating your account's data, please retry

accountDelete.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
accountDelete.youllLoseAllProjects: All your projects will be lost.

accountPasswordReset.atLeast6Chars: your password must have at least 6 characters
accountPasswordReset.couldNotUpdatePassword: there was an error resetting your password, please retry

dashboard.dragProjectTooltip: the project must be static (languages: html, css, js). Your project must have an index.html file
dashboard.introAccessAccount: Access this menu to quickly see the overview of your projects, read documentation or manage your account settings
dashboard.introCreateProject: Create a new project by clicking to choose an option or by dragging a folder here. It can be a .zip or a single folder.
dashboard.introCreateProjectByZip: Create a new project by clicking to choose an option or by dragging a .zip file here.
dashboard.introSendFeedBack: Use this box to send us feedbacks. We want to hear you!
dashboard.nameYourProjectP: The name of your project will be used also to set habemus domain name
dashboard.subTitle: Upload your projects of static websites (html, css, js) to host them in the cloud and have a habemus url

domainInvalid.empty: insert the name of domain you own

feedback.attachImage: would you like to attach an image?
feedback.whatDoYouThink: what do you think of habemus? what can we improve?

project.errorCreatingProject: Something went wrong. Please try again.
project.errorFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again.
project.errorSize: Your project exceeds current limit of 50MB.
project.errorUploaded: An error occured when uploading files. Your project is incomplete. Update your files or delete project to create another one.

projectDelete.p1: This action can not be undone.
projectDelete.p2: Write down the name of project you want to delete:
projectDelete.title: Delete project

connect.p1: Connect a domain you own to your project.
connect.p2: If you still don't own a domain, choose a name provider to have one.
connect.title: connect a custom domain

detail.p2: Managed by a third-party domain provider.
detail.title: edit domain

disconnect.p11: Are you sure you want to disconnect domain
disconnect.p2: This action can not be undone
disconnect.p3: You'll be able to connect it again in the future.
disconnect.title: Disconnect

dns.dnsConfigDelayExplanation: The DNS configurations may take up to 48 hours to propagate throughout the internet. The length of this delay depends on the domain provider where your domain was acquired and your previous DNS configurations.
dns.providerSettingsInstructions: This table shows you the DNS entries needed to connect your domain. Incorrect or missing entries are highlighted in red. Login to your domain provider to manage these settings.
dns.recordDataStabilityTooltip: stability of servers will be good once it reaches 1
dns.requiredRecordDataTooltip: copy data and paste on your domain provider
dns.setupYourDomain: To complete connection you need to setup your domain.
dns.verificationFailedPermanentlyExplanation: verification failed. please try to connect again

info.projectDomains: Your project has the following domains:
info.youCanUseCustomDomain: If you wish to use a custom domain you own, just connect it to your project!
info.youCanUseHabemusDomain: You can use the domain created by habemus.

rename.explanation2: It can be used to access your website.
rename.explanation3: You can rename it if you wish.
rename.safeNameRequired: your domain name must not be empty
rename.serverError: there was an error renaming your project, please try again
rename.warning: Attention: Whenever you rename your habemus domain, the url of your project will be modified and the previous url will not work anymore.

projectGeneral.dragZipToUpdate: drag a zipped version of the project's files to update
projectGeneral.introEditName: Click to edit the name of your project
projectGeneral.introMenuDomains: Connect custom domains and edit the domain created by habemus for your project
projectGeneral.introMenuGeneral: Set general options of your project
projectGeneral.introMenuHistory: See the versions of your project, restore and download them
projectGeneral.introMyProjects: Go back to see the overview of all your projects
projectGeneral.introUpdate: Update your project by dragging the folder here or by clicking to choose the folder from your computer
projectGeneral.introUpdateByZip: Update your project by dragging a .zip file here or by clicking to open the file picker

projectHistory.dragDirectoryToUpdate: drag the project's folder to update
projectHistory.dragZipToUpdate: drag a zipped version of the project's files to update
projectHistory.restoreError: An error occured when restoring the version '{{ versionCode }}'. Please try again later
projectHistory.restoreTooltip: restoring will generate a new version based on this one

projectRename.renameExplain1: You can always rename your project.
projectRename.renameExplain2: If you wish to rename your habemus domain as well, please check the following option.
projectRename.serverSideError: there was an error renaming your project, please try again
projectRename.warning: Attention: Whenever you rename your habemus domain, the url of your project will be modified and the previous url will not work anymore.

sessionExpiredLogin: Sorry, it looks like your session has expired. Please login:

workspace.updateWorkspaceToVersion: Would you like to update your workspace to the version '{{ versionCode }}' ?

zipPrepare.noIndexHtml: we could not find any index.html file in the package you've selected, do you want to continue?
zipPrepare.pleaseZipBeforeUploading: you have selected multiple files, you should zip them in a single file before uploading
